name: TI_2_3_Audit_Notification_and_Review
title: TI.2.3 Audit Notification and Review (Function)
description: Notify of Audit Events, Review Audit Log
purpose:
PHR system functions allow various methods of critical event notification (from audit triggers) as well as routine log review.

Audit log notification and review functions implement requirements according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.2.3#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render a report based on audit log entries.

statement.label: TI.2.3#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render reports based on ranges of system date and time that audit log entries were captured.

statement.label: TI.2.3#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render audit log entry time stamps using UTC (based on ISO 8601).

statement.label: TI.2.3#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to authorize emergency access to certain logs based on criteria such as individual work assignment, specific user role, specific reason(s), or a need to access a specific patient's information/record entries according to organizational policy and/or jurisdictional law.
